fullplot: A gripping, emotionally charged film that follows wrongfully convicted men freed by DNA evidence after decades in prison as they struggle to transition back into society.
plot: A gripping, emotionally charged film that follows wrongfully convicted men freed by DNA evidence after decades in prison as they struggle to transition back into society.
title: After Innocence

tomatoes.consensus: This understated yet emotionally devastating documentary lets the stories of its subjects speak for themselves.
